name: Fixed Sidebar for Tumblr (alpha!)
description: The sidebar is useful, so why not have it accessible all the time instead of when you're just at the top of the page? Just bring it along with you as you scroll instead!
additional_info: 2014/4/2: Update to fix stacking problems breaking the blog selection menu. Known bug: The sidebar floats above many elements, including the body_plexi overlay and xkit's settings menu. 2014/4/1: Initial release. This is an experiment i'm messing with for personal use, but i didn't see any similar and updated styles on us.o, so i figured i'd share it. I haven't spend much time testing it and i've only tested on chrome so far, but feel free to let me know of any bugs and i'll try to fix em! :^)
